name: Rhizome (funtomata)
description:
Rhizome is a tower defense game with a botanical twist. Mad insects are coming after your plant's heart, seeking revenge on... for... erm... REVENGE, who cares! To defend yourself you have to grow your network of roots, and grow defensive towers (vegetables and fruits, either defensive or production based) at their ends. You can branch your network, but beware, as it will reduce the power your roots bring to other towers beyond the branch. By carefully managing your network, anticipating your placement and re-activating ancient towers you might survive long enough to mend your heart

This was submitted for the global game jam. please check us out here and VOTE :-) https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/rhizome-9
